parameter.name: url
parameter.label: Somfy Tahoma Device URL
parameter.description: The identifier of this Somfy device

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Somfy Tahoma Gateway ID
parameter.description: The identifier of this Somfy gateway

options.option: Somfy TaHoma / Somfy Connexoon IO / Somfy (Europe)

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh time in seconds for polling events from the cloud

parameter.name: statusTimeout
parameter.label: Status Timeout
parameter.description: Specifies the timeout in seconds after which the status is got from the cloud

parameter.name: retries
parameter.label: Retries
parameter.description: Specifies the number of retries when command execution

parameter.name: retryDelay
parameter.label: Retry delay
parameter.description: Specifies the delay in milliseconds between subsequent retries after a command failure

parameter.name: devMode
parameter.label: Developer mode
parameter.description: Enables the direct control of your devices over the lan using the local API endpoint. See https://github.com/Somfy-Developer/Somfy-TaHoma-Developer-Mode

parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: Gateway IP
parameter.description: Local IP address of gateway. Relevant only if developer mode is enabled. If not provided, the binding will try to autodetect it

parameter.name: pin
parameter.label: Gateway PIN
parameter.description: Gateway PIN in format ABCD-EFGH-IJKL. Relevant only if developer mode is enabled. If not provided, the binding will try to autodetect it

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: Local token
parameter.description: Local token. Relevant only if developer mode is enabled. If not provided, the binding will try to generate it using the gateway IP and PIN
